diamond_day.name: The Diamond Day
diamond_day.description: During the diamond day players all over the server are finding diamonds. Bring me some too!

broken_roof.name: Broken Roof
broken_roof.description: Have you seen my house? It's roof is broken, help me fix it!

food_festival.name: CubeFest
food_festival.description: This eventing im organizing small festival, CubeFest. If you want to join, hunt some pigs!

clean_wines.name: Clean The Vines
clean_wines.description: Have you seen the vines all around? I bet someone forgot to clean it! Clean all the statues and bring me those vines!

halloween_2020.name: Halloween
halloween_2020.description: Did you know that Halloween is coming? Come help me gather resources for decorations!

the_witches.name: The Witches
the_witches.description: Hey! Please help me, there are so many witches waiting for Halloween to happen. But they are dangerous, can you help me kill them?

the_beacon.name: Light The Sky
the_beacon.description: I have collected some diamonds. To create beacon I need you to visit Mr Wither. Help me light the sky!

light_up.name: Light It Up
light_up.description: Find some coal. Make torches! Use your torches to light your home. Craft and bring me some torches.

cooking.name: Whatâ€™s Cooking
cooking.description: Bake five loaves of bread, two pork chops, two steaks, and two pieces of grilled chicken.

monster_hunting.name: Monster Hunting
monster_hunting.description: Collect me some reward from monster hunting. But be careful some monsters can explode!

the_gateway.name: The Gateway
the_gateway.description: Collect obsidian and build a nether portal in or near your home. Travel thought it and bring me some nether souvenirs!
